content: I've been doing some research on the Arkansas River and I think I have a good idea of the techniques and strategies that will be effective. I've also been practicing my casting and knot-tying skills to make sure I'm prepared for the trip. By the way, I've been thinking about my last fishing trip to Lake Michigan with Alex, and I remember how we had to paddle out to the rocky shoreline in our kayaks to catch those smallmouth bass.
